title: Home Is Where The Boat Is
description:
From the moment they met, Behan and Jaime Gifford loved being on the water and dreamed of a life at sea. So when the opportunity came to make that dream a reality, the Giffords took their family on the adventure of a lifetime.

Follow the Giffords on social media: @sailingtotem on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter

Read stories from the Sailing Totem on their blog

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--

Support us by supporting our sponsors!

Make a great thing even better. Go to OMGyes.com/SMILE for a special discount.

Learn more about your dog with Embark. Use promo code SMILE for $50 off!
